name: E. Goods transportation
statement:
There are cities located along the one-way road. Cities are numbered
from to in the direction of the road.The -th city had produced units of
goods. No more than units of goods can be sold in the -th city.For each
pair of cities and such that you can transport units of goods from the
city to the city . Note that goods can only be transported from a city
with a lesser index to the city with a larger index. Determine the
maximum number of produced goods that can be sold in total in all the
cities after a sequence of transportations.
